thread.title: Terry
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Terry

author: Terry
title: Terry
text: Shower Doctor saved me considerable expense. I have now obsolete Triton T200RE for which spares are hard to come by even from Triton directly.Shower unit is in the loft and outlet and low voltage control panel are are tiled into the cubicle.A new shower would have involved extensive re-plumbing and re-tiling.Shower Doctor was able to supply a new pressure relief device which came with clear instructions and was easy to fit.
